name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Ice Cream Popsicles
description: These Chocolate Peanut Butter Ice Cream Popsicles are like Peanut Butter Cup pops. Creamy Nut butter ice cream drizzles with melted chocolate. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe Makes 5 to 6 pops
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups non dairy milk  (such as almond milk or coconut milk)
1/2 cup smooth peanut butter ( or almond butter, or other nut butter)
2 to 4 tbsp sugar or sweetener  (such as maple or agave)
a good pinch of cinnamon and nutmeg

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir occasioanlly so the nut butter mixes in. Bring the mixture to a boil. It will star to thicken. Whisk well for half a minute while boiling, then take off heat. Cool for 10 minutes. Taste and adjust sweet and mix in. Then pour into pop molds*. Freeze until fully frozen.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir occasioanlly so the nut butter mixes in. Bring the mixture to a boil. It will star to thicken. Whisk well for half a minute while boiling, then take off heat. Cool for 10 minutes. Taste and adjust sweet and mix in. Then pour into pop molds*. Freeze until fully frozen.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the chocolate chips and coconut oil in a double boiler or microwave(in burst of 15 to 30 seconds). Whisk until smooth.. Let it cool for 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the chocolate chips and coconut oil in a double boiler or microwave(in burst of 15 to 30 seconds). Whisk until smooth.. Let it cool for 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the chocolate on the frozen popsicles, or dip the pops into the melted chocolate to make coat completely.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle the chocolate on the frozen popsicles, or dip the pops into the melted chocolate to make coat completely.

recipeInstructions.text: Place on a parchment lined baking sheet and return to the freezer for 15 mins. Store or serve
recipeInstructions.name: Place on a parchment lined baking sheet and return to the freezer for 15 mins. Store or serve
